displayName.english: The Star That Roams the World

description.english: Beyond twenty fates, the cosmos hums along paths of light that only you may traverse.

displayName.english: The Star That Severes the World

description.english: Through twenty fates upon the propelling arcs, the cosmos whispers into slivers of light only you may navigate.

displayName.english: The Star That Reforges the World

description.english: Traversing platforms and twenty fates alike, the cosmos reshapes beneath your steps, answering in patterns of light.

displayName.english: In the End, the World Shatters the Star

description.english: The sixty fates led by the star return to their place, like the perfect circle drawn by time.
